signature: apoc.map.setEntry(map :: MAP, key :: STRING, value :: ANY) :: MAP
name: apoc.map.setEntry
description: Adds or updates the given entry in the `MAP`.

argumentDescription.name: key
argumentDescription.description: The key to add or update the map with.

argumentDescription.name: value
argumentDescription.description: The value to set the given key to.

name: apoc.text.levenshteinDistance
description: Compares the given `STRING` values using the Levenshtein distance algorithm.

argumentDescription.name: text1
argumentDescription.description: The first string to be compared against the second.

argumentDescription.name: text2
argumentDescription.description: The second string to be compared against the first.

signature: apoc.text.regreplace(text :: STRING, regex :: STRING, replacement :: STRING) :: STRING
name: apoc.text.regreplace
description: Finds and replaces all matches found by the given regular expression with the given replacement.

argumentDescription.name: regex
argumentDescription.description: The regular expression pattern to replace in the original string.

argumentDescription.name: replacement
argumentDescription.description: The value to be inserted in the original string.
